overview_of_class: This course examines how power is created, sustained and challenged in entertainment media. Students will learn how and why individuals, groups and corporations achieve and maintain dominance in art, film, television, gaming and digital and social media. Particular attention will be paid to how industries have survived the digital transition. Readings will explore contemporary case studies and debates. Lectures will give theoretical and historical context. This course is intended as an introduction to creative industries and first in a sequence before "Contemporary Television."
name: Power in Entertainment
title: SoC COMM_ST 274-0-20 Power in Entertainment
